com.concordia.riskGame.model.Player

Interface PlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggresivePlayer, BenevolentPlayer, CheaterPlayer, Player, RandomPlayer

    public interface PlayerStrategy
    This interface is for the strategies that a player can have and contains the methods that change with respect to the behaviour of the player and these methods will be implemented in the subsequent classes which implement this interface.
    Author:
    sande

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • reinforcePhase

        Player reinforcePhase(Player player)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface. This method is for the reinforcement of the countries owned by the player.
        Parameters:
        player - We pass the player object who is currently playing the game.
        Returns:
        enriched player object is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error
